Hello dear participant, 

 

thanks for helping us out with generating some benchmarking data. 

We have built an application called SPOT which allows users to search for geospatial information patterns in OpenStreetMap. This tool will help users to easily verify locations in digital media.  

To be able to benchmark our system we need a dataset of human generated sentences that represent users searching for locations in SPOT. We have written clear descriptions of what we want you to do, all you need to do is to generate sentences. Per task we have specified what we need you to include in your sentences and in what style it should be written. 

Example sentences could look like this: 
- Please find me all pharmacies 100m away from a traffic light in Berlin. 
- I am looking for a fountain in large park, there are also public benches in the park. Next to the park is Thalia bookstore. 
- A MacDonaldds within 200 meters from a Bauhaus in Cologne. I can also see a Porta. 

Many thanks for your help, much appreciated. 

If you are ready, then please click on ‘START’.

By participating in this research, you understand and agree that the researcher may be required to disclose your consent form, data, and other personally identifiable information as required by law, regulation, subpoena, or court order. Otherwise, your confidentiality will be maintained in the following manner:
To protect your identity, the researchers will take the following steps: (1) Each participant will be assigned a number; (2) The researchers will record any data collected during the study by number, not by name; (3) Any original recordings or data files will be stored in a secured location accessed only by authorized researchers.
Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may discontinue participation at any time during the research activity.
